Text: hey i get a bin file how do i open that

chrmcc79, in order to read/burn a .bin/.cue file to CD, you need a disk imaging program.  One such program that will burn the files to CD properly for you is IMGBurn.  Just open it and follow the directions.  Then the game will install and run like normal.

Or you could just install daemon tools and mount the image and install that way. I haven't burned an image in... a long time now. Must be almost 1.5 years. There's no point. Hard drive space is so cheap now, and DVD's get scratched no matter what you do.
